title: Episode 67 - Air War in Korea | Great Expectations
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode, we review the early air war in Korea from June to November 1950. We examine US air force strategy before the war, the air force's strained relations with the Army and Navy, along the with challenges the air forced faced in the opening months of the war.
